thread.section_title: The Shower Doctor Ltd Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of showerdoc.com
thread.title: Heather Jones
thread.title_full: The Shower Doctor Ltd reviewed by Heather Jones

author: Heather Jones
title: Heather Jones
text: When my shower broke, I thought I would need to buy a new one, but The Shower Doctor came to the rescue. After a quick search on the site, I found that I just needed a spare part rather than a complete new shower. I ordered the part and it was delivered the next working day. As the online guidance said, the part was easy to fit (in a few seconds), and the shower now works like a dream. Great company to deal with.
